resources.string: Created by Vaibhav Saini and Hiten Thapar \nCMPT276 : https://opencoursehub.cs.sfu.ca/jackt/grav–cms/cmpt276–2/home

In Find The Impostors game, Impostors are hiding under the vented on the game Screen.
The Goal: To find all the Impostors using minimum number of scans as possible.
You can Tap on a vent to check if the a Inpostor is hiding there, If the Impostor there it is revealed.
All the pngs and the background image have been taken from www.citypng.com and https://vectorlogo4u.com 
All the audio files are taken from https://www.voicy.network/pages/among-us
All the CopyRight and Intellilectual property rights belong to Among Us game developer (InnerSloth LLC)
